element.name: GetKey
element.short: Get the key value of a table based on another field value

element.name: GetName
element.short: Get a name value from a table based on a key value

element.name: GetLatLong
element.short: Get the geographical coordinate of a table based on a key value

element.name: GetRankFromSite
element.short: Get the rank/type from a location in gazetteer

element.name: GetRankFromTaxon
element.short: Get the rank key value from a taxon key value

element.name: GetRank
element.short: Get the taxon rank based on a taxon rank key

element.name: GetTaxonHierarchy
element.short: Fill the taxon hierarchy of a record

element.name: GetBotanicHierarchy
element.short: Fill the botanic taxon hierarchy of a record

element.name: GetSiteHierarchy
element.short: Fill the site hierarchy of a record

element.name: FillComboBox
element.short: Fill a combo box item list with values from a table
